QuestData.Title: Break 'Em Out
QuestData.Description:
An Irontide captain "Calico McGee" has been trying to scare us off for days now, but it's not working.
He's ordered his men to lock everyone up and sell us as slaves! They've brought enough chains for everyone!
Break the chains and set our workers free.
QuestData.CompletionText: You need to break the chains!
QuestData.RewardText: With everyone free, we can get back to finding the treasure!
